newsitem.title: GERMANY: Bonn to top up 10-yr 6 pct Bund by 2 bln dmk-Buba.
newsitem.headline: Bonn to top up 10-yr 6 pct Bund by 2 bln dmk-Buba.

text.p: The German government plans to top up its 6.0 percent cash Bund due July 2007 by two billion marks, the Bundesbank said on Thursday.
The central bank said the top-up, which will bring the issue up to a total of 17 billion marks, will be placed through market smoothing operations from June 10.
The 6.0 percent 10-year paper, which is the market benchmark, was quoted at 101.14 for a bid yield of 5.840 percent by 0954 GMT.
